overview: Three middle-aged go for a vacation into the mountains with their children. How will they cope with their youngsters every-day needs without their wives?  The annual men's ride of three fathers becomes something like a kindergarten in the winter countryside due to the wives' vigorous intervention. It turns out that in certain situations, fathers make better moms than moms themselves, which is especially true when moms aren't in sight. Their parenting methods are very peculiar and cause a lot of confusion and hilarity...
title: With You The World Is Fun
